                                               ClassLoader classLoader)

        Clones the given serializable object using Java serialization, using the given classloader to resolve the cloned classes.
        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:
        obj - Object to clone

        public static <T> T deserializeObject(byte[] bytes,
                                      ClassLoader cl)
        Deserializes any serialized object from a byte array, that was serialized by the method serilizeObject before
        Type Parameters:
        T - out type
        Parameters:
        bytes - representing the serialized object
        cl - is the class loader
        Returns:
        the deserialized object
        Throws:
        IOException - should never happen
        ClassNotFoundException - happens if the given class was not found
